bug_description: Posts viewed in the "Hot Comments / Trending" (神评热搜) section are not recorded in the user's history. After watching and entering posts from 神评热搜, these posts do not appear in the personal profile's history records.
action: Open 神评热搜 → tap and view a post → return to Profile → open History / 历史记录.
expected_state: Posts viewed from 神评热搜 should be correctly saved and displayed in the user's history records, consistent with other viewed posts.
